author: sibkatya
content: Hi <@466006586477772831> I am working on PeerDAS metrics. Can't see them in the prometheus while running kurtosis. I tried to build an image from DAS branch locally but it didn't help. What could be the issue with them? Maybe I am doing smth wrong. For example, I am looking for `data_availability_reconstructed_columns_total` but don't have it in the list. Though I see it in the code

author: jimmygchen
content: Hi, are you running a super node? Only super nodes do reconstructions at the moment.

author: sibkatya
content: I guess so) How to detect it? Is it a specific param in the Kurtosis?

author: jimmygchen
content:
https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/1252403418941624532/1262336157640032286

The config here contains the supernode flags for all clients. The node will have to subscribe to all data column subnets.

author: sibkatya
content: Finally it works ü´°  Thanks. ~~Watching~~ Monitoring you üòÅ
